feed.title: heads.dyne.org news feed
feed.subtitle: News from the heads libre privacy GNU/Linux distribution

entry.title: heads is out!
entry.content: It finally happened and it's not vaporware!

entry.title: First announcement of heads
entry.content: [dyne.org](https://www.dyne.org) is proud to announce the new, soon-to-be-released GNU/Linux distribution called **heads**, as you might already see from the website's name :p
